name: Cleaner (itch) (Centro)
description:
Cleaner, as the name says you're cleaning the sea as a ship you can upgrade stuff and that's about it. Have Fun! 

Controls :
  • Move = 'Left Click'
  • Interact = 'E'
  • Open/Close Tablet = 'Esc'

This game was made for SeaJam hosted by PolyMars and Barji.

*Not available on mobile
